Trade/Device Name(s): Herpes Simplex Virus Type 1 IgG ELISA Test
Analyte(s): IgG antibodies to Herpes Simplex Virus Type 1 (HSV-1)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Gold Standard Diagnostics Herpes Simplex Virus Type 1 IgG ELISA Test for qualitative detection of IgG antibodies to HSV-1 in human serum
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of IgG antibodies to Herpes Simplex Virus Type 1 (HSV-1) in human serum as an aid for presumptive diagnosis of HSV-1 infection in sexually active individuals and expectant mothers; not for blood/plasma donor screening or use in pediatric, neonatal, or immunocompromised patients.
